title: Taran Killam | Harvey Weinstein, Donald Trump and Systemic Sexism: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how powerful men in entertainment and politics - from Harvey Weinstein to Donald Trump - abuse their power to silence, bully or coerce. (0:34)

Then, he talks to Taran Killam, who explains how fun it was to work with Arnold Schwarzenegger on his film Killing Gunther. (10:42)

Killam also speaks with Late Night producer Kevin Miller backstage at Late Night. (19:12)
